item.title: TensorRT
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: ONNX parser: Takes a converted PyTorch trained model into the ONNX format as input and populates a network object in TensorRT. Builder: Takes a network in TensorRT and generates an engine that is optimized for the target platform. Engine: Takes input data, performs inferences, and emits inference output.
